DEBUG.description: The debug scope. Set the value to "rrtc" for basic output and/or "rrtc:verbose" for more verbose output (includes the full message for every event). Supports comma-delimited list of debug scopes (e.g. "rrtc,rrtc:verbose") and wildcards (e.g. "rrtc*").

NAMESPACE.description: The namespace to connect to. Must be one of "bots", "perspectives" or "rooms".

QUERY_ID.description: The query you want to use to filter the events. If you want to receive *all* events (i.e. no filter) then set the value to "/" (default).

REAL_TIME_URL.description: The URL of your Refocus Real-Time application.

REFOCUS_TOKEN.description: A valid API token for your Refocus application.
